title: Windows Embedded Standard 7 - SP1 - x86 x64
description:
This is Windows Embedded Standard 7 SP1. These install discs are direct from Microsoft download, they are unmodified. This allows you to install a full copy of Windows 7 to a USB stick without modifications. There is no need for activation or MS toolkit, just enter serial during install and it is activated.

Windows Embedded Standard 7 SP1 can also be found here 
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=11887

Serials
XGY72-BRBBT-FF8MH-2GG8H-W7KCW   (tested)
MPMVY-PP762-WWVBC-83RXJ-2H7RH
7XT84-3XQFP-YMXQF-PP96H-F74DV

Contents
Standard 7 SP1 32bit IBW.iso
Standard 7 SP1 64bit IBW.iso

Installation
*Burn your choice of Windows Embedded Standard 7 IBW DVD disc (x86 or x64)
*Boot from DVD
*In templates choose "Application Compatibility"
*In features make sure you have "Bootable Windows USB Stack" checked
*In features click resolve dependencies and uncheck standard usb stack
*Install
*Enter serial XGY72-BRBBT-FF8MH-2GG8H-W7KCW
